/food-101/images/caesar_salad/2129206.jpg			The Caesar salad includes crisp lettuce topped with grated Parmesan cheese and croutons, dressed with a creamy dressing, and served in a plate with a golden-brown appearance from the croutons and melted cheese.	<>	The Caesar salad is prepared with crisp romaine lettuce, grated Parmesan cheese, and croutons, dressed with a creamy Caesar dressing, served on a plate with a dark background.	<>	Caesar Salad is a fresh salad composed of crisp romaine lettuce, grated Parmesan cheese, croutons, and dressed with a creamy dressing. It's typically served cold and is garnished with a light sprinkle of grated Parmesan.	<>	Caesar Salad is prepared with crisp romaine lettuce, grated Parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing, typically drizzled over fresh greens, creating a visually appealing dish with a balance of textures and a rich, creamy dressing.	<>	Caesar salad is a classic dish featuring crisp romaine lettuce, creamy dressing, grated Parmesan cheese, and crunchy croutons. It is typically prepared by tossing the ingredients together and served as a fresh, refreshing side dish. The vibrant green lettuce and golden croutons contrast beautifully with the white Parmesan, creating a visually appealing dish.
